TITLE: Episode 34 - The Warring Twenties [Adult Language]
DESCRIPTION: New Year, new war crimes. We start off the year with Ryan joining me to talk about the happenings going on over in Iraq and Iran. An assassination, some intrigue, and more than enough death to start the year. Join us as we break it down.
